name: E-commerce Watch Store
description: The E-commerce Watch Store is an e-commerce platform built using Laravel 11 for the back-end and Vue 3 for the front-end, ensuring a modern, responsive shopping experience.
role: Full-stack Developer - Responsible for building the back-end with Laravel, integrating it with Vue.js for dynamic UI, and ensuring proper database management.

name: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio that showcases projects, skills, and experience, built using Vue.js and TailwindCSS, providing a modern, responsive design.
role: Front-end Developer - Built a responsive portfolio with Vue.js and TailwindCSS, ensuring smooth user experience and fast performance.

name: TechLab Pro
description: A mobile application designed for biomedical technicians, students, and residents to manage techniques, reagents, and interactive learning tools.
role: Project Manager & Lead Developer - Oversaw project development, working on both the front-end and back-end aspects, integrating various features.

name: Gestion d'Absence
description: An application designed to help teachers manage student absenteeism, ensuring accurate and quick record-keeping with a user-friendly interface.
role: Full-stack Developer - Built the back-end with Laravel and integrated it with Vue.js for a seamless user experience.

name: Blog Project
description: A simple blog platform where users can create, edit, and comment on posts, offering a basic content management system.
role: Full-stack Developer - Designed and developed the blog's back-end with Laravel and created a dynamic front-end with Vue.js.

name: To-Do List
description: A simple task management app to organize daily tasks with easy-to-use functionality, built with Kotlin and integrated with Firebase for real-time updates.
role: Front-end Developer - Developed the front-end with Kotlin, integrating it with Firebase for real-time updates.
